message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90 just yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $95.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $92, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $97.
I'm still not comfortable with $97. Would you be willing to go down to $94?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $94, but I'm willing to give a bit more. I'll offer it to you for $96.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to go down to $93?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $93, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $95.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
